Sentencas: High-temperature oxidation-resistant alloys are currently considered as a candidate material for construction of interconnects in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Clad metals by roll bonding for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Among these alloys, however, different groups of alloys demonstrate different advantages and disadvantages, and few, if any, can completely satisfy the stringent requirements for the application.
Titulo: Clad metals by roll bonding for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: To integrate the advantages and avoid the disadvantages of different groups of alloys, cladding has been proposed as one approach in fabricating metallic layered interconnect structures.
Titulo: Clad metals by roll bonding for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: To examine the feasibility of this approach, the austenitic Ni-base alloy Haynes 230 and the ferritic stainless steel AL 453 were selected as examples and manufactured into a clad metal.
Titulo: Clad metals by roll bonding for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: Its suitability as an interconnect construction material was investigated.
Titulo: Clad metals by roll bonding for SOFC interconnects

Sentencas: This paper provides a brief overview of the cladding approach and discusses the viability of this technology to fabricate the metallic layered-structure interconnects.
Titulo: Clad metals by roll bonding for SOFC interconnects
